cause.description:
This cause is intended to raise awareness of bipolar disorder (formerly manic-depressive disorder). This is intended to allow those who suffer, or those with loved ones who suffer, to show support.
Visit the myspace forum at:
http://www.myspace.com/bpsupportpage
I started that site for both Bipolar and Borderline, since the two are similar and often coexist.
1. Bipolar disorder and depression, along with other mental illnesses, are not defining characteristics of an individual's personality!
2. Please do not judge or stigmatize because of a diagnosis of mental illness.
cause.mission: promote the realization that mental illnesses do not define people!
cause.name: Bipolar Disorder Awareness
